casebody.data:
Emanuel S. Sutro, et al., Respondents v. The Manhattan Railway Company, et al., Appellants. *496Decided January 11, 1892. Appeal by defendants from a judment entered at special term. Davies & Rapallo, attorneys, and Edward B. Thomas of counsel, for appellants. Peckham & Tyler, attorneys, and E. W. Tyler of counsel, for respondents.

Before Freedman, P. J., McAdam and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
